text: wqalt alyhwd: laysat alnasaraa ealaa shay' min aldiyn alshyh, wkdhlk qalat alnasaraa fi alyhwd wahum yqrwwn altawrat wal'injyl, wfyhma wjwb al'iiman balanbya' jmyeana. kdhlk qal aladhin la yaelamun min mshrky alearab wghyrhm mithl qwlhm, 'aya qaluu likuli dhi dyn: last ealaa shy', fallah yafsil baynahum yawm alqiamat fima akhtalafuu fih min 'amr aldyn, wyjazy kla bemlh
